title: Altostra
description:
This dashboard provides a simple view of your Lambda function logs.

We provide a _free-forever_ plan for developers. Create your free account today at [https://app.altostra.com](https://app.altostra.com).

Read the [Documentation](https://docs.altostra.com) to learn how to get started with Altostra.

We want to hear from you! Share your Altostra experience with us on Twitter [@AltostraHQ](https://twitter.com/AltostraHQ) and [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/company/altostra) and any suggestions that can make your work with Altostra even better.

definition.content:
# Get started with Altostra

This dashboard provides a view of your Lambda functions logs.

Altostra is a no-code infrastructure platform built for developers to accelerate software delivery.

We provide a _free-forever_ plan for developers.  
Create your free account today at [https://app.altostra.com](https://app.altostra.com).

To learn more go to [Altostra Docs](https://docs.altostra.com).

Happy coding!
